text: Nick Parents (formerly Nickelodeon Parents) is a nighttime programming block. It was owned by Viacom Media Networks. It was aired on the Nick Jr. Channel from December 15, 2016 to the present. At this time, children would normally be sleeping. The block broadcasted comedy programming for adults, particularly adults. On February 4, 2022, Nickelodeon Parents was now rebranded as Nick Parents. ==Timesharing history== Nick Jr. timeshared Nickelodeon Parents Every Night from November 29, 2015 to the present. Timeline of Nickelodeon Parents' Operation Hours Date Information Sign-Off Sign-On 2015 Nickelodeon Parents was launched 9:00pm 12:00am 2015—22 Nickelodeon Parents was pulled from 9:00pm to 6:00am 9:00pm 6:00am 2022—present Nickelodeon Parents has become Nick Parents 9:00pm 6:00am Category:Nickelodeon Category:Television programming blocks in the United States Category:American television networks
title: Nick Parents
